sentences.en: Don't pay attention to Patrick; he's full of blarney.
sentences.cn: 别理睬帕特里克, 他满口胡言.

sentences.en: He gave her some blarney about why he was late.
sentences.cn: 他对她说了一些鬼话来解释他迟到的原因.

sentences.en: I want none of your blarney.
In addition the blarney. Ivanovic may also appear in the list.
sentences.cn: 此外的布拉尼. 伊万诺维奇也可能出现在了名单上.

sentences.en: It's not necessary to have kissed the Blarney Stone to be a successful salesman.
sentences.cn: 成为一名成功的推销员未必得吻布拉尼石.

sentences.en: Laday Blarney was particularly attached to Olivia.
sentences.cn: 巴拉尼特别的同奥维雅亲热.

sentences.en: Only a fool will believe your blarney.
sentences.cn: 只有傻瓜才会信托你的甜言蜜语.

sentences.en: The Irish castle now is famous Blarney stone.
sentences.cn: 这爱尔兰城堡的Blarney石头 现在很有名(被称为巧言石).

sentences.en: The Irish castle now is famous for its Blarney stone.
sentences.cn: 爱尔兰城堡现在因它谄媚之石而闻名.

sentences.en: The Irish have a penchant for blarney.
sentences.cn: 爱尔兰人喜欢花言巧语.

sentences.en: The lord of Blarney castle, near Cork, agree to surrender the castle to British troops.
sentences.cn: 爱尔兰南部科克附近的布拉尼城堡的统治者同意放弃这个城堡交于大不列颠军队.

sentences.en: The origins of the Blarney Stone's magical properties aren't clear.
sentences.cn: 巧言石神奇功能的起源并不清楚.

sentences.en: You are so full of compliments today that you must have kissed the Blarney stone.
sentences.cn: 你今天满口都是恭维话,一定是吻过“巧言石”了.

phrases.tran_cn: 巧言石（爱尔兰布拉尼城堡的石头， 相传吻此石头后即善于花言巧语）

trans.tran_cn: 哄骗的话，奉承话，胡扯，欺人之谈
trans.tran_en: pleasant but untrue things that you say to someone in order to trick or persuade them
